data.vision:
To establish PGDM as a preferred choice for producing socially responsible, 
                                    industry-ready management professionals with entrepreneurial zeal.
mission: M1:To develop a globally recognized management institute through academic excellence.
M2:To foster an entrepreneurial and innovative mindset in management professionals.
M3:To develop highly skilled, globally competent, industry-ready professionals with a high order of critical thinking.
M4:To instill values and ethics to produce socially responsible leaders.
